name: Rabbit in a Hole
description:
Habbit in a Hole

“I’m a Rabbit and my lair is near a farm where the owners grow carrots, so of course I'm going to get there and take it to feed my family, but the owners will do everything to stop me”  -The Rabbit

  • WASD - To Move 
  •  Z -  To Dig
  • X - To Interact

Made in Brazil
